chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is having the following problem:
Hello, when will the order be shipped? I've been without a phone for several days and it's quite handicapping in my situation. Thank you in advance. Best regards
Zoé
Thank you for your help,

Hello ,

We wanted to let you know the customer hasn’t received their order.

We’ve checked the tracking link, but there isn’t an update.

https://www.chronopost.fr/tracking-no-cms/suivi-page?listeNumerosLT=GH202901776JB&langue=fr_FR

Can you let us know if the order was shipped, and under which tracking number?
In case the order was not shipped yet, please ship it and provide a valid tracking number, or refund the order under 1 business day.


If you've shipped the order but it's lost, we will gather the paperwork from the customer and forward it to you. We'll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment.

If the delivery starts moving again, a refund won’t be issued, and the order will be considered late.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns — we’ll keep an eye out for your reply.

Thanks for your help,

Hery, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The order is currently being shipped under the tracking number GH202901776JB. Here is the tracking link:
https://www.chronopost.fr/tracking-no-cms/suivi-page?listeNumerosLT=GH202901776JB&langue=fr_FR

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer. If the customer requires no further assistance, kindly close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
